about_the_game: Woods of War is tower defense meets deck builder. The orc clan is in desperate need of resources in their battle with the humans and thus charge brazenly into the ancient mana rich forest of Greenridge Core but quickly find it's not going to be easy. The elves have cast protections on these towering trees so the forest might defend itself. In these woods, sap runs thicker than blood. Each choice you make to build your tree's defenses starts with the hand you are dealt. As spells are cast and arcanum built into armaments, it is up to you to maintain and expand from there to fight off the deadly horde.

short_description: Woods of War is tower defense meets deck builder. Build your tree's defenses from cards you are dealt. As you defeat the orcs, earn new cards, customize your deck and unlock new levels of power. It is your elvish duty to fend off the deadly horde for in this forest, sap runs thicker than blood.
